prompt: Develop a profile page with a minimalist light theme. Feature a square profile picture (140x140px) with rounded corners (radius 15) at the top center. Below it, show the user's name in bold navy text (font size 26) and email in soft gray (font size 14). Place two action buttons (Edit Profile, Logout) side by side with a subtle gray border and transparent background. Use a light beige background (#F5F5F5) with minimal padding (16px). Ensure the layout is vertically centered with a clean, uncluttered look.
